short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get in-page access to ChatGPT, translate, rephrase, and view hyperlinks in place with PageTip

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PageTip Chrome extension enhances your web browsing experience by allowing you to
* Get in-page access to ChatGPT.
* Automatically detect source language of the content and translate selected text to the target language you set
* Assist you in rephrasing your language in place while creating web content.
* Get a quick view of underlying links to avoid focus-switching

By installing this item, you agree to the Google Terms of Service and Privacy Policy at https://www.google.com/intl/en/policies/.
